amendment.description: To require the President to review and approve the Keystone XL Pipeline to assist COVID-impacted communities.

action.text: Amendment SA 1197 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive all applicable budgetary discipline with respect to amendment SA 1197 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 51 - 48. Record Vote Number: 83.
Point of order that the amendment violates section 305(b)(2) of the CBA raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 1197.

Amendment SA 1197 proposed by Senator Tester to Amendment SA 891. (consideration: CR S1238-1239; text: CR S1238) To require the President to review and approve the Keystone XL Pipeline to assist COVID-impacted communities.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive all applicable budgetary discipline with respect to amendment SA 1197 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 51 - 48. Record Vote Number: 83.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1197 proposed by Senator Tester to Amendment SA 891.
